name: BreadBound
description:
After the world is engulfed in a catastrophic apocalypse of mysterious origin, you are humanity's last hope! Use what you learn from talking to fellow townsfolk to get to the Bread before you run out of time. The fate of your future lies in YOUR hands! 

CONTROLS:

  • W - Jump/Up
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Down
  • D - Move Right
  • E - Interact/Advance Dialogue/Select Dialogue and Main Menu Options
  • Enter - Select Main Menu Option
